title: The Pointwise Teaching Partnership
subHeading: The Pointwise Teaching Partnership allows you to use 30 free Pointwise licenses as learning tools for undergraduate and graduate students as long as you maintain your existing Pointwise license.
description: Learn more about how you and your students will benefit from joining us in a Pointwise Teaching Partnership.
copy:
“The undergraduate students picked up the Pointwise code very quickly and easily. The user interface is so intuitive and “familiar” that neophyte CFDers were quickly building high quality grids.”

Dr. Jed Marquart, Ohio Northern University

The Pointwise Teaching Partnership offers

  • 30 free teaching licenses for the same period of performance as your maintained Pointwise license

Qualifications

Teaching licenses are available to recognized degree-granting academic institutions that

  • Have a minimum of
    • one current paid annual Pointwise academic license and/or
    • one Pointwise perpetual license with current maintenance
  • Will be using the free licenses exclusively for a class. These free teaching processes cannot be used for commercially funded research.

Licensing

Teaching partnership licenses do not have to be on the same license server as your academic license, but all free licenses must be on a single server. Additionally, teaching processes will have the same period of performance as the maintained Pointwise process.

Consider Training

Consider attending a three-day class that covers all aspects Pointwise use, from geometry modeling through volume grid generation. The training schedule is available at pointwise.com/training.

Learn More

For more information on the Pointwise Teaching Partnership send an email to teaching@pointwise.com.
